metadata.title: Wednesday, 14th October, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    how many councils, country-wide, were up to-date with payment of Councillors’ allowances as of August, 2015; and
(b)    when the Government will facilitate the payment of all outstanding allowances.
(a)    when the construction of the road from M10 in Maziba area to Chief Mwanamwalye in Senanga District will commence; and
(b)    what has caused the delay in commencing the project.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing what measures the Government has taken to ensure that adequate car parking spaces are created in the city of Lusaka.

parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to expand Itemba Police Post in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    if there are no such plans, why.
(a)    when the construction of the Kalabo-Sikongo road will commence;
(b)    which contractor has been engaged to work on the road;
(c)    what the time-frame for executing the project is; and
(d)    what the estimated cost of the project is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply Motion (9th October) – Resumption of Debate. _________________________
